name: Cozy 4BD apartment with AirBeds
description:
The apartment has 4 bedrooms with Airbeds with 1 bathroom, kitchen & living room.
Laundry, Dry Cleaners, Food, Market Shops near by.
=> House is 5 - 10 mins walk to train station.
T-Rides: 15 mins to Downtown Boston, 20 minutes to MIT, 25 to MGH, 30 to BIDMC, Dana Farber, Harvard Med School, B & W, 30 to Harvard Square.
=> NOTE: Bus#19 is a 20 minutes ride to Children hospital, Dana Farber,
BIDMC, Harvard Medical School, Brigham & Woman hospital
Bus# 15 to Ruggles T station to NEU.

The space
This 4 Bedroom apartment is ideal for 4 students or professionals who want to live together. This apartment also has AC to keep it nice and cool all summer long. This location is convenient with "Free 24 HR Street Parking". In addition, the Laundromat, Cleaners, Food, Market Shops and the Walgreen are all near by.

House Distance from Train: 5 - 10 mins walk to train station.
Train Rides: 15 mins to Downtown Boston, 2
